text: Dear Brigitte is a 1965 American family comedy movie directed by Henry Koster and based on the 1963 novel Erasmus With Freckles by John Haase. It stars James Stewart, Fabian Forte, Glynis Johns, Cindy Carol, Ed Wynn, Brigitte Bardot, Bill Mumy and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1965 comedy movies Category:1960s family movies Category:American family movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Henry Koster
title: Dear Brigitte
